goal.en: 1. By learning fundamental theories and their applications to real-life phenomena, students will acquire professional knowledge in physics and the ability to solve problems. 2. Being able to integrate physics and related knowledge to develop scientific and technological advancements. 3. Applying foundational knowledge in physics to cultivate the ability to solve problems with innovative thinking. 4. Effectively transforming acquired physics knowledge to develop practical solutions applicable to the real world.
goal.ch: 1.透過基礎理論與對應於生活現象的學習，讓學生具備物理專業知識與解決問題的能力 2.能夠統整物理及相關知識，發展科學技術 3.活用物理基礎知識，培養以創新思維解決問題之能力 4.有效轉化所學的物理知識，發展應用於真實世界的實務方案

content.en:
The objective of this course is to provide students with a fundamental understanding of physics. The content includes:
1. Temperature, the first law of thermodynamics
2. Kinetic theory of gases
3. Entropy, the second law of thermodynamics
4. Electric charge, electric field, Gauss‘s law
5. Electric potential, electric current, resistance, circuits
6. Magnetic field, electromagnetic induction
7. Inductance, electromagnetic oscillations, and alternating current
8. Maxwell‘s equations / Properties of matter
content.ch:
本課程目標為讓學生習得基礎之物理學知識。內容包含:
1.溫度，熱力學第一定律 (Chap. 18) (第1周)
2.氣體動力論 (Chap. 19) (第2周)
3.熵、熱力學第二定律(Chap. 20) (第3、4周)
4.電荷、電場、高斯定律(Chap. 21~23) (第5~8周)
5. 電位、電流、電阻、電路(Chap. 24~27) (第10~12周)
6. 磁場、電致磁場(Chap. 28、29) (第13~14周)
7. 電感、電磁振盪與交流電(Chap. 30、31) (第15周)
8. 馬克士威爾方程式/物質的磁性(Chap. 32) (第16周)
